metadata.name: t h e  r e b i r t h
metadata.description: " t h e  r e b i r t h " is a self portrait at 42, after giving up on my dreams as an artist 20 years ago. The lore of NFTs giving power back to the artists became the catalyst for this rebirth as an artist. My newfound love for web3 technology and NFTs has given me hope to pursue my dreams as an artist. That was me at 42.
